rules_text:
Whenever another creature dies, you gain 1 life.
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, transform Dowager of Traublassen.
flavor_text: [i]She spared no tears at the funeral, determined not to let grief take her.[/i]
rules_text2:
Flying
Whenever another creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text2: [i]Now she makes her pain known to everyone else.[/i]
